name: libdot
description: Grab bag of JS utility libraries
author: Chromium OS Authors

scripts.prepare: ./bin/concat -i concat/libdot.concat -o js/libdot.js && cd js && terser libdot.js --compress --mangle --output libdot.min.js --source-map url=libdot.min.js.map,includeSources
scripts.test: ./bin/concat -i concat/libdot.concat -o js/libdot.js && mocha --file js/test_node.js js/*_tests.js third_party/*/*_tests.js
